marklogic.body: I have broken my nose twice. It did not Bleed either time (I have never in my life had a bloody nose) and I did not get black eyes either time (I have never in my life had a black eye). The bottom line is, people are different. The video is not clear, and it doesn't look like he has injuries, yet the officer is walking around him clearly looking at something on the back of his head, and he does it more than once. Furthermore, it doesn't look like his clothes are dirty either, but the officer touches him then clearly wipes his hands Off on his pants.
